    root: cva([\r
        "UI-NavigationMenu__root",\r
        "relative inline-block z-10 max-w-full",\r
    ]),\r
    item: cva([\r
        "UI-NavigationMenu__item",\r
        "relative group/navigationMenu_item inline-flex items-center h-full select-none rounded-[--radius] leading-none no-underline outline-none transition-colors",\r
        "text-[--muted] hover:bg-[--subtle] hover:text-[--text-color] focus:bg-[--subtle]",\r
        "data-[current=true]:text-[--brand]", // Selected\r
        "font-[600] leading-none",\r
        "focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-inset focus-visible:ring-[--ring]",\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                sm: "px-3 h-8 text-sm",\r
                md: "px-3 h-10 text-sm",\r
                lg: "px-3 h-12 text-base",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    icon: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalNav__icon",\r
        "flex-shrink-0 mr-3",\r
        "text-[--muted] group-hover/navigationMenu_item:text-[--text-color] data-[current=true]:text-[--brand] data-[current=true]:group-hover/navigationMenu_item:text-[--brand]",\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            size: {\r
                sm: "size-4",\r
                md: "size-5",\r
                lg: "size-6",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            size: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    itemChevron: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalNav__itemChevron",\r
        "ml-2 w-4 h-4 transition-transform duration-200 group-hover/navigationMenu_item:rotate-180",\r
    ]),\r
    desktopList: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalNav__desktopList",\r
        "inline-block space-x-1",\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            switchToDrawerBelow: {\r
                sm: "hidden sm:flex",\r
                md: "hidden md:flex",\r
                lg: "hidden lg:flex",\r
                never: "flex",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            switchToDrawerBelow: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    mobileTrigger: cva([\r
        "UI-VerticalNav__mobileTrigger",\r
        "items-center justify-center rounded-[--radius] p-2 text-[--muted] hover:bg-[--subtle] hover:text-[--text-color]",\r
        "focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-[--ring]",\r
    ], {\r
        variants: {\r
            switchToDrawerBelow: {\r
                sm: "inline-flex sm:hidden",\r
                md: "inline-flex md:hidden",\r
                lg: "inline-flex lg:hidden",\r
                never: "hidden",\r
            },\r
        },\r
        defaultVariants: {\r
            switchToDrawerBelow: "md",\r
        },\r
    }),\r
    menuContainer: cva([\r
        "UI-NavigationMenu__menuContainer",\r
        "absolute left-0 top-0 overflow-hidden p-1 data-[motion^=from-]:animate-in data-[motion^=to-]:animate-out",\r
        "data-[motion^=from-]:fade-in data-[motion^=to-]:fade-out data-[motion=from-end]:slide-in-from-right-52",\r
        "data-[motion=from-start]:slide-in-from-left-52 data-[motion=to-end]:slide-out-to-right-52",\r
        "data-[motion=to-start]:slide-out-to-left-52 w-full sm:min-w-full",\r
    ]),\r
    viewport: cva([\r
        "UI-NavigationMenu__viewport",\r
        "relative mt-1.5 duration-300 h-[var(--radix-navigation-menu-viewport-height)]",\r
        "w-full min-w-96 overflow-hidden rounded-[--radius] shadow-sm border bg-[--paper] text-[--text-color]",\r
        "data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=open]:zoom-in-90 data-[state=open]:fade-in-25",\r
        "data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-100 data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0",\r
    ]),\r
